text:
I'm about to submit my first theme and I would appreciate your input on an issue.
I've made all my modules as full width sections, which have customizing fields. For example an Image and Text module, has the option to choose which side what shows, 'Image - Text' or 'Text - Image'.

In the theme requirements page, there is a part where it is mentioned that the theme must have `dnd_area` modules.

1. Should I now go through all 50 modules and make them dnd-abble (which will take me a month or so)
2. Can I add a 'flexible' module which supports dnd area and submit it like that
3. Or can I submit my theme as is?
<@U01U201MTQF> you must meet all requirements while submitting theme to the marketplace. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/theme-requirements>
